Mondo Bank - London, UK - Android Engineer (Onsite, Permanent and Contract)

We’re a small team working to create the best bank account in the world.

We're obsessed with making our customers’ lives easier by giving them a simple realtime view of their finances, easy sending and spending, and complete control from their smartphone. And when they aren't around, our customers will feel safe in the knowledge that we'll monitor things and let them know if anything needs their attention.

We're now looking for two Android engineers to help us build the best banking app in the world.

https://mondo.workable.com/jobs/183279
